long_description: This detailed guide features 50 hikes in the Upper Peninsula's Copper Country, through the Iron Range, the Land of Hiawatha and the Pictured Rocks region,. Author: Thomas Funke. Softcover; 240 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. The Countryman Press; copyright 2008. Hikes range in length from a 1 mi. ramble to a multiday backpacking trip and provide something for hikers of all abilities. Overview chart at the front of the book makes it easy to choose a hike at a glance based on distance, difficulty, family-friendly features, waterfalls and overlooks. Each hike description includes a topographic map and at-a-glance information on mileage, elevation, time, USGS maps, amenities, pets and footwear. Provides information on the geology, wildlife and history of each trail. Includes index of common plants and animals with their Latin names.
short_description: This detailed guide features 50 hikes in the Upper Peninsula's Copper Country, through the Iron Range, the Land of Hiawatha and the Pictured Rocks region,.
